front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Low-Rate Wireless Networks Amendment: Enhanced Ultra WideBand (UWB) Physical Layers (PHYs) and Associated Ranging Techniques
front.abstract: This amendment enhances the UWB PHYs with additional coding options and improvements to increase the integrity and accuracy of ranging measurements. It also enhances the MAC to support control of time-of-flight ranging procedures and exchange ranging related information between the participating ranging devices.
